original_text: “‘Every grain offering you bring to the Lord must be made without yeast, for you are not to burn any yeast or honey in a food offering presented to the Lord.
korean_text: 너희가 여호와께 드리는 모든 소제물에는 누룩을 넣지 말지니 너희가 누룩이나 꿀을 여호와께 화제로 드려 사르지 못할지니라

sentences.original_text: Every grain offering you bring to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 주께 가져오는 모든 곡물 제물은

sentences.original_text: for you are not to burn any yeast or honey
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 당신은 어떤 누룩이나 꿀도 태우지 말아야 하기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: in a food offering presented to the Lord
